"Let's begin.": "Our goal is singular. Cross the desert and storm the stronghold..."
"We don't have much time or manpower left... I ask that you all lend me your aid."
"You have my blade... I would have it no other way."
"The Dome's defenses are great. We won't be able to just walk right in."
"Naturally, it will not be a simple task. Once we reach the Dome we will have to divide our numbers..."
"I will lead the main force to the center where Lenus Retem lies while we chip away at them."
"The particulars will be handled by Hadi, Jalil, Mohsen, and myself. Everyone should make their preparations before the operation begins. Dismissed."
"I'm sorry for the trouble. If I could see those materials we spoke of earlier..."
"Records of past battles are stored in here."
"There may not be any information that could turn the tides of this battle..."
